title: Directs the review of the west of Hudson River New York city drinking water supply system program
summary: Directs the commissioner of environmental conservation and the commissioner of the New York city department of environmental conservation to review the west of Hudson River New York city drinking water supply system program and make recommendations to alleviate the threat of flooding in certain areas.
